column1: Project Plant Pals: Salesforce Sales Cloud Implementation Project
Description: Implement Salesforce Sales Cloud to enhance sales processes, improve customer relationship management, and provide actionable insights through advanced reporting and analytics.

column2: An overview of the project, key elements and expectations
Identifies the work that is included in the project and the pricing that was quoted initially.
Identifies the potential risks to the project, their likelihood, and how you plan to mitigate them if they become realized.
Identifies the planned schedule as well as any changes through out the project lifecycle.
Identifies the planned budget as well as any over and under runs.  Allows you to estimate the cost at completion.
Identifies how often, what type of communication method, and what information your stakeholders needs to know
Identifies who is responsible, accountable, consulted and informed within the project.
